DPRK FM meets new ambassador of Austria 
     Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Paek Nam Sun met and had a talk with newly appointed ambassador of Austria to Korea Erich Buttenhauser who paid a courtesy call on him today.
